channel.title: Portfolios on Jirong's sandbox
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Jirong's sandbox

item.title: Performance of Fully Automated Portfolio Mgt. and Algo. Trading System (a.k.a. Jarvis)
item.description: Portfolio Performance (Track record from 8 Sep 2020 where I fully automated algorithmic trading system) Overall portfolio Risk parity portfolio Volatility risk premium portfolio Algorithmic trading and portfolio management architecture As of Aug 2020, I’ve fully automated my trading & portfolio management. See here (https://medium.com/datadriveninvestor/designing-and-building-a-fully-automated-algorithmic-trading-portfolio-management-system-6945c6c87620) for the full architecture. Peformance monitoring component of Jarvis is explained here (https://medium.com/datadriveninvestor/developing-a-performance-monitoring-component-in-my-fully-automated-algorithmic-trading-system-88f5afae05cd) & (https://medium.com/datadriveninvestor/developing-a-performance-monitoring-component-in-my-fully-automated-algorithmic-trading-system-983368441bba) As much as possible, I will try to live by this mantra: Anything that can’t be automated doesn’t have a place in my portfolio.
